Get Started

Frequently Asked Questions

  • How do deployments work?

    Every push to main triggers Cloudflare Pages to run npm run build and publish the static dist/ output. Pull requests receive preview URLs.

  • What file formats are supported?

    Package metadata is YAML-first. Docs live in Markdown/MDX, transformed via Astro during builds.

  • Can I self-host instead of Cloudflare Pages?

    Yes—Astro emits static assets. You can deploy them to any CDN or object storage bucket if Cloudflare is not available, though Pages remains the recommended path.

© 2025 CobolDepot. Built for mainframe teams.

Cloudflare Pages deploys from main. Preview builds are created for every pull request to validate Docs, Packages, and Search updates before release.
